tossup_question: -   –  What is the name of the force that accounts for the deflection of a moving object due to the Earth’s rotation?
bonus_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three statements that are true regarding charged coupled devices: 1) Charged coupled devices can often be found in cameras; 2) Charged coupled devices operate via the photoelectric effect; 3) Pixels in charged coupled devices are made of metal conductors.
